name: We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition contains the We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie game along with the Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack.

[Set Contents]
Main Game
Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack

■Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack
[Contents]
《Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack》
*25 songs added that can be played in stages of We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie.
*All songs are recorded in the game.

[Recorded Song List]
■From Katamari Damacy
Katamari of Love ~ Ending Theme
Cherry Blossom Color Season
LONELY ROLLING STAR
The Moon and the Prince
Katamari On the Rocks ~ Main Theme

■From Me & My Katamari
Family Damacy
Caesar's Island
Shine! Mr. Sunshine
Katamari On the Funk
Shabadoobie

■From Beautiful Katamari
BOYFRIEND A GOGO
Harvest of Love
INTO THE SKY
Katamarity
Spinning Gravity

■From Katamari Forever
Katamaresort Song
Houston (Re-Arranged by KIRINJI)
Everlasting Love + You
Sayonara ROLLING STAR (Yuri's Mixx)
Katamari on the Swing (SEXY-SYNTHESIZER ALL ABOUT namco Mix)

■From Touch My Katamari
Katamari of Love (SEXY-SYNTHESIZER Remix)
Sky & Music of 2011 (feat. Asako Toki)
Alien (feat. BAKUBAKU DOKIN)
Across the Katamari (feat. Kazuhiro Momo from MO'SOME TONEBENDER)
Hello World (feat. Taku-sama)

《Costume Item:Little King》
A costume that can be worn by The Prince or Cousins.
*Change costumes from Menu /[Presents].
